description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

My name is Qianjun Befanis, this is end of my 4th week teaching on Udemy, and this is my 5th course. One of the reason I can do it fast is to take fear out of my schedule. Fear is like fire, without air it will be gone, and time is the air. In this course I am going to show you how to setup your first website for Udemy promotion in about 1 hour.

There are a lot of Udemy teachers still doesn't have their own website. The reason people don't take action is because of fear. I am going to walk you through how to build it with details and at the same time keep the lecture as concise as possible. You can build it as fast as in 1 hour and as low as $20 when you just get started! Once we get you busy and take the time that you spent on worrying out of your work schedule, we take fear out. We can re-invest that hour into building the site.

Using beginner friendly flexible templates, as well as Word Press free template I teach you how to quickly build a website in around 1 hour, by doing this, I can help you eliminate excuses like no time, not sure if you should spend money.

Come join me in this journey, and setup your first site now.
title: Set Up a WordPress Site for Your Udemy Promotion - Unofficial
